creator: SupremeVue
descriptionHtml:
An application for ecobee thermostats that works on Android 5.x+ and Android Wear, allows for quick and easy management of the ecobee thermostat and adds features not available in the official app.


All app features are enabled in the free version. Purchasing the app will remove advertising only. You are free to choose how you want to use the app without worrying that you are missing any features.


Geofence option to automatically set Away/Home mode
Notification and home screen widgets to quickly change comfort settings
Multiple report options - daily, 7 day, and monthly
Support for multiple locations/groups
Quick summary display of thermostats and sensors
Supports Celsius and Fahrenheit temperature settings
Widget available for quick view of thermostats
Auto-refresh of main application, widget, and wear information
Usage reports showing HVAC system use and indoor/outdoor temperature
Temperature alert settings for outdoor and indoor temperatures
One button away mode where you can set the away start and end times
Adjust away settings while still in away mode
Support for remote sensors
Support for Android Wear


This application allows you to view and change your ecobee thermostat settings, set away/back modes, change HVAC/Fan modes, change thermostat names, view last read time, and edit away times for ecobee thermostats.


You can view all of your ecobee controlled thermostats by location, current temperature information, outside temperature, and average indoor temperature. Moving between thermostats is as easy as swiping left or right or clicking the tabs. You can change individual thermostat settings, set specific away settings, and disable away mode. Turning off your HVAC or Fan for individual thermostats is also supported.


Send any issues or questions to support@supremevue.com. Due to ecobee requirements you must authorize this application via a PIN code on the ecobee web portal. The application will provide instructions on how to do this.




Features:
★ View and change temperatures for all thermostats.
★ Temperatures displayed to one decimal places.
★ Quickly change HVAC and Fan modes
★ Set Away/Back mode including start and end times and target temperature settings
★ Edit away times when in Away mode
★ Change thermostat name
★ View average indoor and outdoor temperatures
★ View HVAC usage reports and outdoor/indoor temperatures
★ Set temperature alerts for indoor/outdoor temperatures
★ Configurable Widget for quick view of thermostats
★ Android wear notifications and widget-like view of thermostats
★ Daily usage reports for all thermostats
★ Remote sensor information displayed


Please note the following:
1) Current temperature is displayed to one decimal places so that you can understand why your heating/cooling is running even when it appears to be at temperature. This comes directly from the thermostat and is not an estimate.


IMPORTANT: This is NOT an official ecobee application (nor are we affiliated in any way with ecobee) and the app only reads information available from the ecobee web site and does not connect to your thermostats directly. If your thermostats show as disconnected or you suspect other issues, login to the actual ecobee web site to verify the application shows the same information or contact your energy company/ecobee for assistance.

Moving between thermostats is as easy as swiping left or right or clicking the tabs. You can change individual thermostat settings, set specific away settings, and disable away mode. Turning off your HVAC or Fan for individual thermostats is also supported.


Send any issues or questions to support@supremevue.com. Due to ecobee requirements you must authorize this application via a PIN code on the ecobee web portal. The application will provide instructions on how to do this.




Features:
★ View and change temperatures for all thermostats.
★ Temperatures displayed to one decimal places.
★ Quickly change HVAC and Fan modes
★ Set Away/Back mode including start and end times and target temperature settings
★ Edit away times when in Away mode
★ Change thermostat name
★ View average indoor and outdoor temperatures
★ View HVAC usage reports and outdoor/indoor temperatures
★ Set temperature alerts for indoor/outdoor temperatures
★ Configurable Widget for quick view of thermostats
★ Android wear notifications and widget-like view of thermostats
★ Daily usage reports for all thermostats
★ Remote sensor information displayed


Please note the following:
1) Current temperature is displayed to one decimal places so that you can understand why your heating/cooling is running even when it appears to be at temperature. This comes directly from the thermostat and is not an estimate.


IMPORTANT: This is NOT an official ecobee application (nor are we affiliated in any way with ecobee) and the app only reads information available from the ecobee web site and does not connect to your thermostats directly. If your thermostats show as disconnected or you suspect other issues, login to the actual ecobee web site to verify the application shows the same information or contact your energy company/ecobee for assistance.

This application allows you to view and change your ecobee thermostat settings, set away/back modes, change HVAC/Fan modes, change thermostat names, view last read time, and edit away times for ecobee thermostats.


You can view all of your ecobee controlled thermostats by location, current temperature information, outside temperature, and average indoor temperature. Moving between thermostats is as easy as swiping left or right or clicking the tabs. You can change individual thermostat settings, set specific away settings, and disable away mode. Turning off your HVAC or Fan for individual thermostats is also supported.


Send any issues or questions to support@supremevue.com. Due to ecobee requirements you must authorize this application via a PIN code on the ecobee web portal. The application will provide instructions on how to do this.




Features:
★ View and change temperatures for all thermostats.
★ Temperatures displayed to one decimal places.
★ Quickly change HVAC and Fan modes
★ Set Away/Back mode including start and end times and target temperature settings
★ Edit away times when in Away mode
★ Change thermostat name
★ View average indoor and outdoor temperatures
★ View HVAC usage reports and outdoor/indoor temperatures
★ Set temperature alerts for indoor/outdoor temperatures
★ Configurable Widget for quick view of thermostats
★ Android wear notifications and widget-like view of thermostats
★ Daily usage reports for all thermostats
★ Remote sensor information displayed


Please note the following:
1) Current temperature is displayed to one decimal places so that you can understand why your heating/cooling is running even when it appears to be at temperature. This comes directly from the thermostat and is not an estimate.


IMPORTANT: This is NOT an official ecobee application (nor are we affiliated in any way with ecobee) and the app only reads information available from the ecobee web site and does not connect to your thermostats directly. If your thermostats show as disconnected or you suspect other issues, login to the actual ecobee web site to verify the application shows the same information or contact your energy company/ecobee for assistance.
